name: part_004
file: tmp_【告知あり！】雪花ラミィ、大好きな先輩を呼んでやりたい事やってみた【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [QVHob_M0aH0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Lamy explains the rules of the pedometer shaking game, and the group decides where each person will attach their device.
Akirose prepares for the challenge. Lamy attaches the pedometer to Akirose's waist.
Akirose performs her 30-second shake challenge while the others cheer her on.
Akirose's result is announced, and Marine prepares for her turn, choosing to attach the device to her 'lower butt'.
Marine performs her 30-second shake challenge, followed by the announcement of her result.

subtitles.original: 装着して、30秒間全力でフリフリしていただきます。
subtitles.english: Equip it and shake it for 30 seconds with all your might.

subtitles.original: なるほど。
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.english: The person with the most shakes wins. It's a 'simple is best' kind of game.

subtitles.english: Hmm, maybe here since I have muscles?

subtitles.original: そうですね。

subtitles.original: ということで、アキ先輩が腰、マリン先輩がお尻、ノエル先輩が大胸筋ということで、はい。

subtitles.original: ま、そういう...

subtitles.english: With all your might! Is that okay? Thank you so much.

subtitles.english: This might become rare footage.
